import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { TextField, FormControl, InputLabel, Select, MenuItem } from '@material-ui/core'; import { Row, Col } from "reactstrap" import storeTime from "../../../reducers/storeTime"; import { changeTime } from "../../../actions/storeTime"; class StoreHours extends Component { state = { timeData: [ { id: 1, time: "12:00 AM" }, { id: 2, time: "01:00 AM" }, { id: 3, time: "02:00 AM" }, { id: 4, time: "03:00 AM" }, { id: 5, time: "04:00 AM" }, { id: 6, time: "05:00 AM" }, { id: 7, time: "06:00 AM" }, { id: 8, time: "07:00 AM" }, { id: 9, time: "08:00 AM" }, { id: 10, time: "09:00 AM" }, { id: 11, time: "10:00 AM" }, { id: 12, time: "11:00 AM" }, { id: 13, time: "12:00 PM" }, { id: 14, time: "01:00 PM" }, { id: 15, time: "02:00 PM" }, { id: 16, time: "03:00 PM" }, { id: 17, time: "04:00 PM" }, { id: 18, time: "05:00 PM" }, { id: 19, time: "06:00 PM" }, { id: 20, time: "07:00 PM" }, { id: 21, time: "08:00 PM" }, { id: 22, time: "09:00 PM" }, { id: 23, time: "10:00 PM" }, { id: 24, time: "11:00 PM" }, ] } handleChange = (event) => { const storeTime = this.props.storeTime.storeTime const data = storeTime.filter(item => item.day === this.props.day)[0] data.startTime = event.target.value console.log(storeTime) } render() { const { age, timeData } = this.state const { storeTime } = this.props.storeTime const startTime = storeTime.filter(item => item.day === this.props.day)[0].startTime const endTime = storeTime.filter(item => item.day === this.props.day)[0].endTime return

Monday
Start Time End Time
} } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ isAuthenticated: state.auth.isAuthenticated, auth: state.auth, storeTime: state.storeTime, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { changeTime })(StoreHours);
